### **Begin patient engagement in the formulation of a care management plan.**
* Unique ID: rec044
* Evidence Letter: B
* Category Name: COMPREHENSIVE MEDICAL EVALUATION
* Page: S26
* Feasible: Yes
* Type: Rec
* Comments: All patients with diabetes

#### Implementation:

(ICD9: Diabetic Type I) OR (ICD9: Diabetic Type II) OR (ICD9: Diabetes: Unspecified Type) OR (ICD10: All_Diabetic) OR (SNOMED: Diabetes Type I) OR (SNOMED: Diabetes Type II) OR (SNOMED: Diabetes Unspecified Type)
